comments.en: 4 cartridges: one each for CMYK. Also 4 replaceable printheads.

Best output quality reachable with the "hpijs" driver.

When used with HP's "hpijs" driver, this printer auto-detects the paper type and does appropriate dithering and colour adjustment internally, controlled by the hardware. So even when GhostScript with the "hpijs" driver only renders the image with 300 or 600 dpi, the 1200x600 dpi are used for the internal dithering. So if you insert photo paper, the printer will print in its highest quality, no paper type choice in the driver's options is needed.
